title: Problem About Setup LOL
body:
Hello. Could anybody help me solve a problem about downloading the game?
This morning, I went to the download page of LOL, and I pressed the download bottom. After doing so, I began to setup. However, I met a problem that my setup program was block at the status which was extracting prerequisite software. Now, my setup program still sticks at that status and I still cannot setup the game.
That's very weird. I really want to play the game. Could anybody who knows the solution for this problem helps me? Thank you a lot!

replies.body: It looks like your operating system might be blocking the installation.  Please reach out to player support [through a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if the [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide DTN provided did not resolve this.  We'll be able to review your specific issue further and find out what's happening.  Feel free to include your screenshots in the ticket as well!  Please let me know if you have any questions.

I think you should try running the installer as an admin by right clicking the icon and selecting "Run as Administrator". If you have User Account Control (UAC) enabled, you may need to disable that as well. If you continue to run into this problem, try to get a screenshot of the error you are getting so I can see what it is.

You may find further installation and patching troubleshooting in the following articles; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions
Thank you for your help! But I still cannot solve this problem. Could you please give me your email address? So I can send a screenshot. I don't know how to send a screenshot here.

To put an image in your post, you'll need to upload it to a third party site such as [imgur](http://imgur.com/) or [gyazo](https://gyazo.com/search), then right click the image there and copy its image URL/address and post that. I'm not going to share my email, but if you wish to get help from Riot Support personally you can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
OK, that's fine. And I have posted the picture. Please have a look. Thank you!
